description:
Those who tuned in to the 50th anniversary episode of Doctor Who were given another treat in the form of a short teaser revealing some previously never-before-seen footage.收看《神秘博士》50周年纪念特集的观众获得了一份额外惊喜——一段《神探夏洛克》的短预告片，其中公布了许多之前从未现身的镜头。

John Watson popped up in all his mustachioed glory, as did Sherlock’s colleague Anderson, sporting a new beard.约翰·华生以小胡子造型精彩亮相，夏洛克的同仁安德森警探也以新的胡须造型出场。

In keeping with Sherlock’s modern day setting, a Holmes fan can be seen holding up her mobile phone as tweets and hastags pop up all over the screen.为了凸显该剧的时代气息，视频中有一个福尔摩斯粉拿起她的手机，接着推特和标签四处纷飞，挤满了屏幕。

However, those hoping for an air date confirmation were left sorely disappointed, as the words ‘Coming Soon’ appeared on the screen in the trailer’s closing moments.然而在这段预告片的结尾，屏幕上还是出现了“即将归来”的字样——那些渴望获知确切播放时间的粉丝们又一次希望落空。

你觉得Sherlock第三季会在什么时候播出？《神探夏洛克》第三季回归时间大竞猜>>>

As #SherlockLives trended on Twitter, fans were beside themselves with glee.无论如何，#SherlockLives这一标签已经开始在推特上流行，粉丝们欢喜的忘乎所以。
